amendment.description: Amendment sought to preserve the union rights of existing employees transferred to the new Department of Homeland Security who have the same duties.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 107-615 to protect the union rights of employees transferred into DHS with the same job responsibilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Morella amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 222 (Roll no. 357).
